practiceSets.prompt: You are an expert behavioral interviewer. Analyze the practice test responses
practiceSets.title: Behavioral Interview Practice
practiceSets.description: Practice common behavioral interview questions to improve your interview skills
practiceSets.instructions: Answer the questions based on your own experiences and knowledge.
tips: Use the STAR method (Situation, Task, Action, Result) to structure your answers
Be specific and provide concrete examples
Focus on your role and contributions
Practice active listening and maintain eye contact
Be honest and authentic in your responses
Prepare multiple examples for common questions
Stay calm and composed during responses

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you had to work under pressure
Describe a situation where you had to resolve a conflict with a team member
Give an example of a time when you had to make a difficult decision
Tell me about a time when you failed and how you handled it
Describe a situation where you had to adapt to a significant change
